title: Git Tag Mini Cheat Sheet Revisited
description:
Just as a kind of mini cheat sheet for using git tags. JÃ¶rg Mittag had some great additions that weren’t in the original post which warrant a new post.
Git has three different type of tags:
 Lightweight tags Annotated tags Signed tags  Let’s start with lightweight tags.
Lightweight tags In the previous cheat sheet only the lightweight local tags were discussed. A lightweight tag is nothing more than a reference to a particular revision or SHA1 object name in the repository.
